name: Electro Magnate
description:
This is a simple 2D clicker about electricity business. But, unlike most games of this genre, here you can not only win, but also lose!

You will have access to the following functionality:
  • Manual dynamo. Start with the simplest way to generate electricity. And, if you don't get tired of clicking, just upgrade your dynamo and click, click, click!
  • Purchase of generators. Generate electricity to sell and earn money. But remember that equipment requires money for maintenance!
  • Purchase of batteries. Store the accumulated electricity for later sale. But remember that if the battery capacity is not enough, then the excess electricity disappears! Batteries also require money for maintenance.
  • Hiring a sales office. Hire sales managers or trading bots to sell the accumulated energy. But remember that managers and bots require money!
  • Modernization. Upgrade generators, batteries and sales office for more efficient work.
Keep track of your income and expenses so you don't go bankrupt!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2292770/Electro_Magnate/
